title: Requirements
fullText:
This Section details requirements for visual inspection and additional testing of an electrical installation to confirm that the installation is in good repair/working order and does not show signs of misuse or damage and passes the additional testing requirements as detailed in this document.
The inspection and testing of this Section requires the disconnection of supply to all or parts of the installation.
Inspection and testing of electrical equipment shall include those items specified in Sections 3 and 4 together with the additional requirements of this Section.
